name: Swisscom Status
body:
# What is Swisscom Status?
It is an Android application that uses the "status" service from Swisscom to check the remaining SMS/Data credit of a phone plan.

# How does it work?
It sends a SMS to the regular 444 number and waits for a response. It then parses the response and tries to find the information.

# I want it!
You can [download it from Google Play](http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=pro.schmid.android.solde).

# I want a widget!
Me too :)
tagline: Android app to check the remaining SMS/Data credit for Swisscom
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
